commit message: Moved StandardDialogs to the dialogs namespace

Improved 'properties' code and new prefs for cropping and camera

- added 'Use external tool for cropping' pref
- added 'auto-rotate camera images' pref
- modified 'Other Preferences' to use more streamlined preference code
- modified preference code to make building preferences easier
Added hint for camera image rotation

Fix overwrite of cover images if cropping cancelled and other
image-related bugs

- covers are now cropped to a temp file
- camera images are now captured to a temp file
- temp file names are different each time a photograph is taken
